title: Mondays With Mike: January 2015 Edition
teaser: It’s the first Monday of the month, which means it’s time for another edition of Mondays with Mike. Joy Cardin and WPR program director Mike Arnold look at special programming highlights on tap for January. Plus, since it’s also the first Monday of the year, they welcome your New Year’s resolutions for Wisconsin Public Radio.
